Application.Apps.Temperature.app_temp¶

Module Contents¶

Functions¶

index()

Renders Home Page for Temperature APP.

app_temp[source]¶
_title = Temperature[source]¶
paths = ['/sys/bus/w1/devices/28-00000c7e5ff0/w1_slave'][source]¶
pixel = 64[source]¶
index()[source]¶

Renders Home Page for Temperature APP. Shows all Temperature Sensors on a 8x8 Grid. Sensors not sorted. Called GET/POST at / and /home

Returns

The Home Page for the Temperature APP

Return type

rendered html

init_temperature()[source]¶

Initialises the Temperature Sensors. Looks for all available sensors. Called POST at /init_temperature

Returns

data contains working sensors

Return type

json

ajax_response()[source]¶

Tries to get Data of the initialised Temperature Sensors. Saves the values with their timestamp in a array in Order of their occurence in app_temp.sensors. Called POST at /init_temperature

Returns

data contains list of time of temperature measurement and temperature

Return type

json
